title: #82 - Tim Heidecker
description: On this episode of The H3 Podcast we're joined in the studio by Tim Heidecker! Together we discuss his incredible multi-media project On Cinema, his big break with Bob Odenkirk, transitioning between comedy and dramatic acting, and what his dad's like. Tim Heidecker is a comedian, musician, actor, and the co-founder of Abso Lutely Productions and a huge inspiration to h3h3productions! Thanks for coming by Tim!
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
